english.segment1: Artist: Audio Adrenaline. Album: Some Kind Of Zombie. Song: New Body
english.segment2: Never been accused, or been confused. with a model on a cover page. Never could've been a superstar in the NBA. Can't run that fast, never could. breakdance, can't jump a building in a single bound. Anticipate, can't wait till I hear that sound.
english.segment3: The sky splits, I'm moving, I let it freely take me. This must be the moment, God picked. to rearrange me.
english.segment4: You and I, want a new body. You and I, want to fly.
english.segment5: Crutches left upon the ground, bodyparts lost are found, everybody. gets to walk today. No more tears and we will feel no pain.
english.segment6: The sky splits, I'm. moving. I let it freely take me. this must be the moment, God picked to rearrange me.
english.segment7: You and I, want a new body. You and I, want to fly. You and I, can get a new body. You and I, will never, never die
english.segment8: Never gonna die. I'm gonna fly. Never gonna die. I'm gonna fly
english.segment9: You and I, want a new body. You and I, are gonna fly. You and I, can get a new body. You and I will never, never die
english.segment10: The sky splits, I'm moving. I let it freely take me. this must be the moment. God chose to rearrange me.
